snippet.title: Fate/Samurai Remnant Opening Animation
snippet.description:
"Your wish shall perish..." A Holy Grail War begins in Edo Japan.

Pre-order now: https://bit.ly/3Qur0bX

Fate/Samurai Remnant is scheduled to release September 29, 2023 on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and Steam®, and is currently available for pre-order.

The "Waxing Moon Ritual", a battle to the death between seven Masters and their Servants to pursue their wishes...

Opening Animation Director: Nakaya Onsen
Opening Animation Production: CloverWokrs
Theme Song: Zanya Gensou feat.LICCA, Spiral Ladder
